eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

Interface IScanner

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILenientScanner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StrictScanner

    public interface IScanner
    Common interface for all scanners. Throws ScannerExceptions when unrecognized characters are encountered in the input.
    Author:
    Florian Deissenboeck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close scanner and any underlying readers.
      IToken getNextToken()
      Returns the next token.
      void reset(java.io.Reader reader, java.lang.String originId)
      Reset the scanner.

    • Method Detail

      • getNextToken

        IToken getNextToken()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    ScannerException
        Returns the next token.
        Returns:
        the next token. Returns ETokenType.EOF when current file is entirely scanned.
        Throws:
        ScannerException - Thrown upon scanner problems.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the scanner encounters problem during file I/O.

      • reset

        void reset(java.io.Reader reader,
           java.lang.String originId)
        Reset the scanner.
        Parameters:
        reader - new input reader.
        originId - originId

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Close scanner and any underlying readers.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of an IO exception
